items.title: Scunthorpe player and Forest fan among train attack victims
items.description: Scunthorpe United footballer Jonathan Gjoshe, 22 and Nottingham Forest fan Stephen Crean were stabbed.

items.title: Scunthorpe player and Forest fan among train attack victims
items.description: Scunthorpe United footballer Jonathan Gjoshe, 22 and Nottingham Forest fan Stephen Crean were stabbed.

items.title: French climber among at least three killed in Nepal avalanche
items.description: A search is continuing in the Dolakha district for several other foreigners who were accompanied by local guides.

items.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested over leak of video allegedly showing Palestinian detainee abuse
items.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking a video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

items.title: No signs 'cruel' alleged McCann stalking would stop, court hears
items.description: A jury has been given legal directions as a trial at Leicester Crown Court enters its fifth week.
